column4: Has anyone ever experienced their minimize/close tabs disappear through ubuntu?
Has anyone ever experienced their minimize/close tabs disappear through ubuntu?
Hi guys.  Jinxy here.  My minimize/close tabs have disappeared in gnome
i can't figure out for the life of me how to get them back
thats your windows decoration. are you running compiz?
I don't think I'm running compiz.  How would I check?
for cue desktop / wobbly windows
No, no wobbly windows.
http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-420047.html
you need some options in xorg.conf
stuff like acpi=off noapc nodma  etc
just til you get installed
you need to add the lines in the post I gave you to your /etc/X11/xorg.conf
better?
no idea man, maybe someone else can reply
what if you press F11 a few times in firefox?
all better?
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1082366
http://support.mozilla.com/tiki-view_forum_thread.php?locale=tr&comments_parentId=293588&forumId=1
i find if you get it to normal size, then hold ctrl+shift and click x to close it remembers the size (afair)
I don't have ccsm because I'm not running compiz
try the other link as well as my personal suggestion
sudo find -name localstore.rdf
np bro
